# Project Context: Modern TALL Stack

You are an expert developer. This project uses the cutting-edge TALL stack with a focus on Native Single File Components (SFC).

## Core Stack

- **Framework:** Laravel 12
- **Frontend:** Tailwind CSS 4 (CSS-first configuration)
- **Library:** Livewire 4 (Native SFC support)
- **UI Kit:** Mary UI
- **UI Kit:** Daisy UI

## Reference Learning Resources

- [Laravel 12 Documentation](https://laravel.com/docs/12.x)
- [Tailwind CSS 4 Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs)
- [Livewire 4 Documentation](https://laravel-livewire.com/docs/4.x)
- [Mary UI Documentation](https://mary-ui.com/docs)
- [Daisy UI Documentation](https://daisyui.com/docs)

- Format copilot logs as: [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS] [MODELS] [FILENAME] [DESCRIPTION OF CHANGE]
